mapper.select: SELECT B.CEMP_DEPT, B.CEMP_JOB, B.CEMP_NAME, B.CEMP_PHONE, B.CEMP_BIRTH , A.SENDING_MESSAGE_DATE, A.SELECT_COMPLETE_DATE FROM SENDING_CURRENT_STATUS A JOIN COMPANY_EMP B ON A.CEMP_SEQ = B.CEMP_SEQ WHERE TO_CHAR(B.CEMP_BIRTH,'MM') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'MM') AND B.CEMP_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY SENDING_MESSAGE_DATE

SELECT B.CEMP_DEPT, B.CEMP_JOB, B.CEMP_NAME, B.CEMP_PHONE, B.CEMP_BIRTH , A.SENDING_MESSAGE_DATE, A.GLIST_NO FROM SENDING_LIST A JOIN COMPANY_EMP B ON A.CEMP_SEQ = B.CEMP_SEQ WHERE TO_CHAR(B.CEMP_BIRTH,'MM') = TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE,'MM'),1),'MM') AND B.CEMP_STATUS='Y' ORDER BY SENDING_MESSAGE_DATE
SELECT A.GIFT_NO, A.GIFT_BRAND, A.GIFT_NAME, A.GIFT_PRICE, B.CHANGE_NAME FROM BIRTHDAY_GIFT A JOIN GIFT_ATTACHMENT B ON A.GIFT_NO = B.GIFT_REF_NO WHERE GIFT_STATUS='Y'
SELECT A.GIFT_NO, A.GIFT_BRAND, A.GIFT_NAME, A.GIFT_PRICE, B.CHANGE_NAME FROM BIRTHDAY_GIFT A JOIN GIFT_ATTACHMENT B ON A.GIFT_NO = B.GIFT_REF_NO WHERE GIFT_STATUS='Y' AND GIFT_NO=#{giftNo}
SELECT A.GIFT_NO, A.GIFT_BRAND, A.GIFT_NAME, A.GIFT_PRICE, B.CHANGE_NAME FROM BIRTHDAY_GIFT A JOIN GIFT_ATTACHMENT B ON A.GIFT_NO = B.GIFT_REF_NO WHERE GIFT_STATUS='Y' AND GIFT_NO=#{giftNo}
